analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya  dassanena apahātabba duka kusala ttika
translated: The Section on the Triad with Non-Disappearance

original: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.🔽Dassanena pahātabbaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo naakusalo dhammo🔽uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena🔽pahātabbo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabbam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na dassanena pahātabbaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka  dassanena pahātabbam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na dassanena pahātabbaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammo  uppajjati hetu paccayā na dassanena pahātabbam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na dassanena  pahātabbaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā dve pe avigate dve
translated: With a profitable factor that is not to be abandoned by seeing as condition there arises a non-profitable factor that is not to be abandoned by seeing. With a cause as condition, one … With an absence as condition, one.

original: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nanadassanena pahātabbo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabbam abyākatam dhammam paccayā na na dassanena pahātabbaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā dve pe avigate dve
translated: With an unprofitable factor that is to be abandoned by seeing as condition there arises a non-profitable factor that is not to be abandoned by seeing. With an unprofitable factor that is to be abandoned by seeing as condition there arises a non-profitable factor that is to be abandoned by seeing. With a cause as condition, two … With an absence as condition, two.🔽With an indeterminate factor that is not to be abandoned by seeing as condition there arises an indeterminate factor that is not to be abandoned by seeing. With a cause as condition, two … With an absence as condition, two.
